english.segment1: It's ironic times we live in. But I guess I'll just have to bite the bullet cuz it's too big to swallow. Oh well. It seeps into my body. Eats me from the inside out. It devours all it sees as I fall onto my knees. Why must it seek to kill and destroy?. Why must it make a slave, toy?. Why must it find its way body and kill it. Guess I'll just have to bite the bullet.
